Also, it is mentioned that Lee Harvey Oswald, believed to have fired the shots that killed President John F. Kennedy, was associated with this location. | Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Sixth Floor Museum | old Texas School Book Depository | Cannot determine |

Note: The table shows that the Sixth Floor Museum is not explicitly stated to be based in the old Texas School Book Depository.
